Room.Name: Wine cellar
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the darkest part of the wine cellar beneath the Grinning Sailor.
Room.LongDescription: Although the room is unlighted, you see odd luminous shapes flitting between the wine casks. Now what could that be? From the next room, you hear the trap door open and then a thumping noise. A howl of glee comes from the pit below. Something just brushed up against you!
